response.job_title: Back-end developer | Data Analytic | Python | Java | Industrial Engineer|
response.summary: Industrial engineer with a strong technological focus and a passion for crafting innovative solutions. My experience encompasses the development of functional websites using Java, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, as well as proficiency in data analytics using Python and the creation of intuitive dashboards with Power BI and Tableau. I am dedicated to staying abreast of the latest technological trends and possess the ability to collaborate within teams and effectively tackle challenges. My objective is to grow professionally and attain excellence in web development and data analysis. I am keen to discover opportunities where I can apply my skills and contribute to the success of technological projects .
response.skills: Java, JUnit, NetBeans, MySQL, Programming, Back-End Web Development, Front-End Development, Databases, HTML, CSS, Agile Methodologies, Analytics, Python (Programming Language), SQL, Adaptation, Project Management, Organization Skills, Report Writing, Data Analysis, Strategic Planning

profile_positions.description: Supervision of the execution of scheduled activities in the field and financial execution in the units in charge according to the investment and expense program. Likewise, participate and represent Fedecacao - National Cocoa Fund in meetings and events, in which inter-institutional relations and resource management were strengthened. Additionally, identify needs in terms of the cocoa sector.
profile_positions.title: National Technical Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Support in the coordination, planning, scheduling and follow-up of the technical assistance programs of the Fondo de Fomento Panelero, which was developed in 15 departments nationwide to improve the technical, agronomic, agribusiness and agri-environmental processes of sugarcane producers.
Management of budget, personnel, schedules and compliance with program activities and objectives.
profile_positions.title: Coordination support professional

profile_positions.description: Follow-up on the construction of reservoirs in the department of Cundinamarca, which included: visits to locate the excavation area, delivery of reports, minutes per user, communication with beneficiaries and project programming.
profile_positions.title: Professional Engineer

profile_positions.description: Research work in LPF-TAGRALIA as a final degree work, in which data collection, statistical analysis, presentation of results and publication of a research article were carried out.
profile_positions.title: Research Worker

school.name: Universidad Nacional Abierta y a Distancia

company.name: Federación Nacional de Cacaoteros
company.description: La Federación Nacional de Cacaoteros tiene como misión representar y proteger los intereses de los cacaocultores colombianos, contribuyendo con su desarrollo integral, ofreciendo servicios de extensión rural, investigación y la comercialización del producto a nivel nacional e internacional, contribuyendo con la protección del Medio Ambiente.
